{"id":1008371954,"question_id":463,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 year, 1 month","timestamp":1690796444,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"88 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1008371954/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Island Perimeter","memory":"96.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int islandPerimeter(vector<vector<int>>& grid) {\n    int rows = grid.size();\n    int cols = grid[0].size();\n    int perimeter = 0;\n\n    for (int i = 0; i < rows; i++) {\n        for (int j = 0; j < cols; j++) {\n            if (grid[i][j] == 1) {\n                perimeter += 4; // Add initial perimeter for each cell\n\n                // Check if there's an adjacent cell on the top, bottom, left, or right\n                if (i > 0 && grid[i - 1][j] == 1) {\n                    perimeter -= 2;\n                }\n                if (j > 0 && grid[i][j - 1] == 1) {\n                    perimeter -= 2;\n                }\n            }\n        }\n    }\n\n    return perimeter;\n}\n\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"island-perimeter","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
